talk.author: did:plc:jtir3tfw5lgp34t7akdbwgkl
talk.utter:
There were in fact lawsuits about it.

The Maine SoS can point to an actual court case concluding that the fascist is a seditionist; there was no court case concluding that Obama was not a natural-born citizen.

(I am not expecting ME's or CO's decisions to stand, mind you.)

talk.author: did:plc:mivey63nzylfflvmmjoqcf6u
talk.utter:
Yes, I know. I worked on one of those cases as a law clerk, and attended hearings in others.

But I'm not sure which court case, other than the Colorado one, you're referring to for Trump.

talk.author: did:plc:jtir3tfw5lgp34t7akdbwgkl
talk.utter: I am in fact referring to the Colorado one.

talk.author: did:plc:jtir3tfw5lgp34t7akdbwgkl
talk.utter: I am in fact referring to the Colorado one.

talk.author: did:plc:mivey63nzylfflvmmjoqcf6u
talk.utter: Which was a ballot challenge case conducted on a short timeline that did not offer Trump the same ability to collect or present evidence that he would have had even in a normal civil case, much less a criminal one.

talk.author: did:plc:jtir3tfw5lgp34t7akdbwgkl
talk.utter: As I said, I don't expect them to stand.
